verbose_text: Pregabalin inhibited neuronal responses to punctate mechanical stimulation (15, 26, and 60 g) in SNL (XREF_FIG, A and I; 2-way RM ANOVA, P = 0.00831, F 1,7 = 13.236) but not sham operated rats (XREF_FIG, B and J; 2-way RM ANOVA, P = 0.486, F 1,6 = 0.552).
